text: Dead Calm is a 1989 Australian psychological thriller drama movie directed by Phillip Noyce and starring Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman, Billy Zane. The screenplay by Terry Hayes was based on the 1963 novel of the same name by Charles Williams and was distributed by Warner Bros.. == Other websites == * * Category:1989 drama movies Category:1989 thriller movies Category:Psychological movies Category:Australian thriller movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Phillip Noyce Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Dead Calm (movie)
